mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a folded notecard. The front is a color picture which is identified on the back of the card as, "Lexington, Virginia." Part of the additional notes on the back credit the image as, "Contemporary primitive painting of Historic Lexington, Virginia, by Page Huff Dillon, 1980." The handwritten note inside the card reads, "Dear Mrs. Alexander, Please thank your members for their part in making our flower show a success. Thanks for your help. Houston Close."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Note from Houston Close to Mrs. Alexander
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Wood, Mrs. Alexander Barbour
Close, Houston
